name: hourly_forecast_48_hours
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool easy_weather.
Tool description: Detailed current conditions, hourly forecasts, daily forecasts, and weather alerts by latitude and longitude in JSON format.
API description: Fetches a 48-hour weather forecast for the specified latitude and longitude coordinates.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for the forecast location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for the forecast location.
